dct_title_s: Map of part of the State of Indiana through which the New Albany and Mount Carmel Rail Road will pass
dct_description_sm: Detached from U.S. 24th Cong., 3rd Sess., 1838-1839, S. Doc. No. 49. "the red shaded lines show the exterior six miles limits on each side of straight lines drawn from New Albany to Corydon" to Princeton, Ind. to Mount Carmel, Ill. that show the approximate route of the proposed railroad. Figures indicate the number of acres of land that are "unsold or other unappropriated" and the number of acres "sold or otherwise appropriated within townships and parts of townships embraced with the red limits."
Scale: Scale not given.; Dimensions: 21 x 54 cm, on sheet 23 x 66 cm
